title.narrative: Strengthening interagency collaboration and social protection systems through Interagency Social Protection Assessment tools

description.narrative: The project will provide a strategic input to build capacity of both ISPA partners as well as their counterparts in government agencies at country level for the application of the ISPA tools. The outputs are: A webinar series on the Public works tool is organized; a face-to-face a regional training in Asia is organized; related training materials for this purpose are developed; and the final target groups are ILO constituents working on social protection, including government officials and social partners as well as other international agencies, development organisations and social protection experts carrying out social protection technical advisory services.

participating-org.narrative: Germany, Deutsche Gesellschaft für Internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ)

department.narrative: Departement of Partnerships and Field Support (PARDEV)

sector.narrative: ILO Results Framework 2020-2021: Output A.2. Authoritative and innovative research to enable policy development and lead on frontier issues in the world of work

transaction.ref: RAS/17/15/DEU-2019-RAS126 - Products and services from research and statistics in the region have strengthened the ILO’s position as a global centre of excellence
